description: This table contains data about actions taken by providers on care gap alerts for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: VB_HM_CARE_GAP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the care gap type for the value-based care gap that was acted on.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lipid Panel


Hemogram


ALT Measurement


Creatinine Measurement


Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) Measurement


Hemoglobin A1C Measurement


Lead Screening


Urine Protein Screening


HIV Screening


Hepatitis C Screening


Chlamydia Screening


Osteoporosis Screening


Breast MRI


Eye Exam


Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm (AAA) Screening


Diabetic Foot Exam


Lung Cancer Screening


Mammography


Cervical Cancer Screening


Colorectal Cancer Screening


Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) Screening


COVID-19 Immunization


Diphtheria, Tetanus, and Pertussis Immunization


Cholera Immunization


Hepatitis A Immunization


Hepatitis B Immunization


Hib Immunization


HPV Immunization


Influenza Immunization


Japanese Encephalitis Immunization


Meningococcal ACWY Immunization


Meningococcal B Immunization


Measles, Mumps, and Rubella Immunization


Pneumococcal Immunization


Polio Immunization


Rabies Immunization


Typhoid Immunization


Yellow Fever Immunization


Zoster Immunization


Varicella Immunization


Rotavirus Immunization


Wellness Visit


BMI Screening


Nutrition Counseling


Exercise Counseling


Antipsychotic Adherence


Rheumatoid Arthritis Treatment


Nephropathy Screening


Statin Therapy


Statin Adherence


Advance Care Planning


Functional Status Assessment


Medication Review


Pain Assessment


Blood Glucose Screening


Ebola Immunization


Blood Pressure Screening


Diabetes All Class Adherence


Beta-Blocker Adherence


Antiretroviral Adherence


RAS Antagonist Adherence


Depression Screening


Orthopoxvirus Immunization

columns.name: VB_CARE_GAP_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the action taken on a value-based care gap.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Progress Made


Already Done


Does Not Apply


Patient Refused


Deferred


Activated

columns.name: VB_CARE_GAP_ACTION_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that a user acted on a value-based care gap.

columns.name: VB_CARE_GAP_END_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant a value-based care gap action expires.

columns.name: VB_CARE_GAP_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who acted on the value-based care gap.

columns.name: VB_CARE_GAP_ALERT_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ALT CSN associated with the value-based care gap action.
